en:
/price [currency name] - ğŸ’° Display the current price of [currency name].  
â¡ï¸ Example: Get the real-time price of the currency.  

/change [currency name] week - ğŸ“‰ğŸ“ˆ Show the weekly change in [currency name] price.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Analyze the weekly performance of the currency.  

/change [currency name] month - ğŸ“Š Show the monthly change in [currency name] price.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Track the monthly trend of the currency.  

/reasons [currency name] - ğŸ§ Learn the reasons behind the increase or decrease in [currency name] price.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Understand news or events affecting the price.  

/comparison [currency name] - âš–ï¸ Check if [currency name] price is high or low compared to its history.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Compare current and historical prices.  

/upcoming_events [currency name] - ğŸ“… Discover upcoming events that may impact [currency name] price.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Track upgrades or influential events.  

/target_price [currency name] - ğŸ¯ Find out the target or expected price of [currency name] for the upcoming period.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Set investment goals.  

/monitor [currency name] - ğŸ‘€ Learn how to monitor [currency name] price in real time.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Stay up to date with live updates.  

/analysis [currency name] increase - ğŸš€ View analyses suggesting an upcoming increase in [currency name] price.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Support bullish investment decisions.  

/technical_analysis [currency name] - ğŸ› ï¸ Learn how to apply technical analysis to [currency name].  
â¡ï¸ Example: A guide for using tools and indicators.  

/trend [currency name] - ğŸ”„ Use technical analysis to predict [currency name] price trends.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Determine whether the trend is upward or downward.  

/indicators [currency name] - ğŸ“¡ Discover the most useful technical indicators for analyzing [currency name].  
â¡ï¸ Example: RSI, MACD, and more.  

/buy_sell_signals [currency name] - ğŸ’¹ Check buy or sell signals for [currency name] on the charts.  
â¡ï¸ Example: Analyze entry and exit points.  

/ma [currency name] - ğŸ“ Learn how to use moving averages (MA) to predict [currency name] price movement.  
â¡ï¸ Example: 50-day or 200-day moving averages.  

/rsi [currency name] - ğŸ“ˆ Learn how to use the Relative Strength Index (RSI) for analyzing [currency name].  
â¡ï¸ Example: Shows overbought or oversold conditions.  

/support_resistance [currency name] - ğŸ—ï¸ Discover support and resistance levels in analyzing [currency name].  
â¡ï¸ Example: Key trading levels.
